ProjectName.jp: 永永久磁石同期モータのホールベクトル制御 - 1シャント電流検出方式

Description.en:
[Description]
This project is the software of vector control for permanent magnetic synchronous motor with hall sensors by using functions of RA6T2 microcontroller.
[Features, Target System]
-Hall sensor feedback
-Vector control
-1-shunt current detection method
[Hardware Setup]
-CPU board : RA6T2(R7FA6T2BD3CFP) CPU board (RTK0EMA270C00000BJ)
-Inverter board : MCI-LV-1
-Communication board : MC-COM
-Motor : R42BLD30L3
[Supported QE function(s)]
-SW configuration
-Analyzer
[Document Number]
R01AN6979EJ0100

[機能、対象システム]
